video.title: Iron Chef America Collection
video.synopsis: Based on the Japanese cult cooking series, "Iron Chef America" pits talented chefs against select culinary masters in a test of skill and taste.

episodes.synopsis: Duff Goldman, star of Food Network's "Ace of Cakes," challenges Iron Chef Michael Symon in a showdown involving chocolate and chiles.
episodes.title: Symon vs. Goldman

episodes.synopsis: "Top Chef" competitor Spike Mendelsohn squares off against Iron Chef Michael Symon, with prosciutto on the menu.
episodes.title: Symon vs. Mendelsohn

episodes.synopsis: In his first competition, chef Geoffrey Zakarian faces Iron Chef Masaharu Morimoto in a battle with sardines as the secret ingredient.
episodes.title: Morimoto vs. Zakarian

episodes.synopsis: Australian organic specialist Curtis Stone hopes to take down Iron Chef Bobby Flay in a challenge featuring skipjack tuna.
episodes.title: Flay vs. Stone

episodes.synopsis: Chef Christopher Kostow from Napa Valley's the Restaurant at Meadowood squares off against fellow Californian Cat Cora.
episodes.title: Cora vs. Kostow

episodes.synopsis: In his Iron Chef debut, Paul Miranda goes up against Cat Cora in a challenge involving bourbon as the secret ingredient.
episodes.title: Cora vs. Miranda

episodes.synopsis: Chef Michael Solomonov challenges fellow Philadelphian Jose Garces with passion fruit as the secret ingredient.
episodes.title: Garces vs. Solomonov

episodes.synopsis: Chicago's Todd Stein sets out to knock New York icon Bobby Flay off the throne in a competition with mussels on the menu.
episodes.title: Flay vs. Stein

episodes.synopsis: Multiple Iron Chef winners Bobby Flay and Masaharu Morimoto each pair up with a special guest chef in a battle for supremacy.
episodes.title: Team Flay vs. Team Morimoto

episodes.synopsis: Jonathon Sawyer challenges Iron Chef Geoffrey Zakarian in this episode that features mint as the secret ingredient.
episodes.title: Zakarian vs. Sawyer

episodes.synopsis: Two iconic Iron Chefs, Marc Forgione and Masaharu Morimoto, square off in a grilling challenge involving Mangalitsa pig.
episodes.title: Morimoto vs. Forgione

episodes.synopsis: In Hawaii, three Iron Chefs each team up with a counterpart from a different branch of the military for a three-way grilling showdown.
episodes.title: Military Grill Battle

episodes.synopsis: James Beard Award nominee Stephanie Izard gives Iron Chef Michael Symon a run for his money in a bread-themed challenge.
episodes.title: Symon vs. Izard

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca Weitzman, executive chef at Brooklyn's Thistle Hill Tavern, challenges Iron Chef Jose Garces, with Silkie chicken on the menu.
episodes.title: Garces vs. Weitzman

episodes.synopsis: After a losing bid to dethrone Geoffrey Zakarian in "The Next Iron Chef: All-Stars," will Michael Chiarello have what it takes the second time around?
episodes.title: Zakarian vs. Chiarello

episodes.synopsis: Iron Chef Thailand's Ian Kittichai faces off against Iron Chef America Marc Forgione in a battle involving tea...and coffee beans.
episodes.title: Forgione vs. Kittichai

episodes.synopsis: Iron Chefs Geoffrey Zakarian and Alex Guarnaschelli square off in the first round of the Iron Chef Tournament of Champions.
episodes.title: Zakarian vs. Guarnaschelli

episodes.synopsis: The Tournament of Champions gets underway with Iron Chefs Jose Garces battling Marc Forgione; the winner faces Masaharu Morimoto in Round Two.
episodes.title: Garces vs. Forgione

episodes.synopsis: Iron Chefs Geoffrey Zakarian and Michael Symon go head-to-head in the second round of the Tournament of Champions, which involves wings and peanuts.
episodes.title: Zakarian vs. Symon

episodes.synopsis: Jose Garces competes against Masaharu Morimoto in the liver-themed second round of the Tournament of Champions.
episodes.title: Garces vs. Morimoto

episodes.synopsis: The final round of the Tournament of Champions pits Michael Symon against Jose Garces, with the title of Grand Champion on the line.
episodes.title: Tournament of Champions Finale

episodes.synopsis: Chef Michael Voltaggio, owner and executive chef of L.A.'s ink., challenges Iron Chef Bobby Flay with Iberico pork as the secret ingredient.
episodes.title: Flay vs. Voltaggio

episodes.synopsis: Southern Italian specialist Stephen Kalt challenges Iron Chef Alex Guarnaschelli in an episode involving jerky and Mason jars.
episodes.title: Guarnaschelli vs. Kalt

episodes.synopsis: Three American Iron Chefs, including Bobby Flay and Marc Forgione, test their grill skills against a trio of Australian rivals.
episodes.title: Grill Masters

episodes.synopsis: Iron Chef Bobby Flay and actor Anthony Anderson take on Masaharu Morimoto and food writer Simon Majumdar in a bar food competition.
episodes.title: Ultimate Bar Food
